Costas Ferris (amụrụ na 18 Eprel 1935) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Gris, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-emepụta ihe
O dere okwu nke Aphrodite's Child's album 666
Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1983 bụ Rembetiko meriri Silver Bear na 34th Berlin International Film Festival.
Emume ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke Berlin
